subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Andy Bean saved par on No. 18 after hooking his drive left, holding on for a two-under 70 and a one-stroke win over Loren Roberts in the Champions Tour’s Regions Charity Classic in Hoover, Ala.
snippet: Andy Bean saved par on No. 18 after hooking his drive left, holding on for a two-under 70 and a one-stroke win over Loren Roberts in the Champions Tour’s Regions Charity Classic in Hoover, Ala.
